tasks.label: ST-LINKv2 flash
tasks.command: set -a; source ${workspaceFolder}/.env; cp build/app/$GD32F3_APP/gd32f3-eval.elf build/app/gd32f3-eval.elf; openocd -f interface/stlink-v2.cfg -f target/stm32f3x.cfg -c init -c "reset halt" -c "flash write_image erase build/app/$GD32F3_APP/gd32f3-eval.bin 0x08000000" -c reset -c exit

tasks.label: CMake: clean rebuild
tasks.command: set -a; source ${workspaceFolder}/.env; cmake -GNinja -Bbuild -DGD32F3_APP=$GD32F3_APP; cmake --build ${workspaceFolder}/build --config Debug --target clean --; cmake --build ${workspaceFolder}/build
